info.brief_description: A possession story with some focus on impersonation. 4000GP FOR GOOD CHAPTERS
info.description:
This story follows Shu, a fresh college graduate doing an internship at an incredibly well established company. The building is over 15 stories tall and lives in the heart of downtown. The company has easily over a thousand current employees.

Initially, Shu was excited at the prospect of doing his internship at such a well established organization. But due to his position as an intern, Shu is at the absolute bottom of the pecking order.

He is pushed around and given the jobs no one else wants to do. Shu meets it with apathy, believing his life will always be this way; until one day Shu finds a box in his new apartment containing a jewel that sucks itself into his skin. Shu takes this power in stride, deciding he will make it to the top, in any way possible

Whenever Shu possesses someone, his body will continue as normal. He can depossess anyone at any time and become a spirit to find someone else to possess

Some characters, however you can add more

*everyone at the company will wear some form of business attire just for consistency

Faith -28- your direct supervisor. She is very stuck up and uptight, leaving you with very tedious work. She is the typical office lady. Conservatively dressed with her brown hair tied in a bun with a cute figure.

Stephanie -31- the head of human resources. From your conversations with her she's a kind woman with a lot on her plate. She is constantly managing complaints and never seems to get a break. She wears business casual dress and has beautiful blonde hair with a mesmerizing face

Victoria -23- a fellow intern. You are not entirely sure how she got an internship here. She is always slacking off, worrying more about her make up and nails then the work itself. Despite her poor work you can't deny she's attractive; with long blonde hair and great C cup breasts

Alyssa -24- your team lead. She is very blunt, taking a direct approach whenever she can to get the job done. She is one of the few people that you can call a friend. She loves to work out and has a fantastic ass. She sometimes comes to work straight from the gym and you can't help but stare.

Amelia -26- the company case manager. A bubbly woman who enjoys her job. She is beloved by everyone and has found great success at her young age. She is quite short (5'0") with D cup breasts and a fine ass

Elise -32- the event planner. Elise single-handedly plans all major company events without breaking a sweat. She has an incredible sense of style with a refined flair to everything she does. She has long dark brown hair with C cup breasts and a fine ass

Rules:
No abrupt endings
No gore
Keep powers to just possession
